value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE COMBOS - Professional Team Games!
value.excerpt: Most of the pro games in StarCraft 2 are played in 1v1. In this video we watch professional gamers face off against each other in 2v2 instead.  00:00 Serral & Mixu vs Spirit & Elazer 25:20 Serral & Mixu vs Rattata vs Skillous  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv Become a YouTube

value.title: StarCraft 2: SERRAL vs CURE! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: A best-of-5 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Serral and Cure, the current number 1 and 2 on Aligulac.
